title: Arena
data:
'''Arena''' can refer to multiple different things:
*The '''[[Okawaru|Arena]]''' branch, accessible only by using [[Okawaru]]'s Duel ability. This is the only mention of "arena" in the main game.
*[[The Arena]], a seperate mode where you pit 2 teams of monsters against each other, often used for testing.
*Certain [[Dungeon Sprint]] modules:
**The [[Arena of Blood]]
**[[Arenasprint]], aka [[Thunderdome]]

{{Disambig}}
